featured.text: The Hebrew Bible states that Nehemiah, an official serving King Artaxerxes of ancient Persia, asked permission to travel to Judah.

definition.zh_def: 亞達薛西斯，古波斯帝國的國王，通常指代亞達薛西斯一世或亞達薛西斯二世。
definition.en_def: Artaxerxes, a name of several kings of Persia, commonly referring to Artaxerxes I or Artaxerxes II.
definition.example: Artaxerxes I was known for his efforts to maintain peace in the Persian Empire.
